title: Clipboard Share
description: Share text and files securely between devices
description_subtitle: Files and text are transmitted using end-to-end encryption without going through servers.
create_description: Create a new sharing session and get a code
join_description: Enter a session code to join an existing session
scan_instruction: Align the QR code within the frame
scan_manual_hint: No camera? Enter the code manually instead.
scan_camera_error: Camera access was blocked. Please allow camera permissions and try again.
scan_camera_unsupported: Camera scanning isn't available on this device or browser.
scan_decode_error: We couldn't find a session code in that QR.
scan_qr: Scan QR code to join from another device

file_transfer.title: File Transfer
file_transfer.drop_zone_text: üìÅ Drag files here or click to select
file_transfer.transfer_in_progress: File transfer in progress, please wait
file_transfer.selected_files: Selected Files: (Auto-sent or waiting for connection)

messages.websocket_connected_partial: WebSocket connected, but file transfer may not be available, please try to re-establish connection
messages.file_selection_interrupted: Connection interrupted during file selection, reconnecting...
messages.connection_unstable: Connection unstable during file selection, recommend re-establishing connection for better transfer quality
messages.connection_check_failed: Connection status check failed, recommend refreshing page to reconnect
messages.session_expired: Session expired or does not exist, please create a new session
messages.files_too_large: Files too large! The following files exceed {maxSize}MB limit: {fileNames}
messages.connection_not_ready: Connection not ready, please wait for connection to establish
messages.file_sending_in_progress: File sending in progress, please wait for current sending to complete
messages.receiving_files_wait: Receiving files, please wait for reception to complete before sending
messages.multiple_files_cancelled: Multi-file sending cancelled, stopping remaining files
messages.transmission_cancelled_no_end_signal: Transmission cancelled, not sending file_end signal: {fileName}
messages.transmission_cancelled_during_flow_contr: Transmission cancelled during flow control wait
messages.refuse_new_file_cancelled: Transmission cancelled, refusing to start receiving new file: {fileName}
messages.discard_chunk_cancelled: Transmission cancelled, discarding file chunk: fileId={fileId}, chunkIndex={chunkIndex}
messages.ignore_end_signal_cancelled: Transmission cancelled, ignoring file end signal: {fileName}
